text:
To Make Up For All That Waiting, Deepika-Ranveer Finally Share Breathtaking Pics From The Wedding
To Make Up For All That Waiting, Deepika-Ranveer Finally Share Breathtaking Pics From The Wedding
Everything about Ranveer Singh and Deepika Padukone's wedding pictures says: Forever. The couple solemnized their six-year-old relationship by tying the knot and exchanging vows in Italy amidst their close friends and family.
While the wedding was a private affair, Deepika and Ranveer made sure that all of us feel like we are a part of their celebrations by giving us a glimpse into their world.
Instagram/Deepika Padukone
Today, the couple took to Instagram to share some more inside pictures from the wedding and made our social media feeds look like a place where only love and happiness exists.
Instagram/Deepika
From the pictures of their Sindhi ceremony to all the Konkani traditions, these pictures will really make your hearts happy!
Instagram
Don't Miss 185 SHARES 460 SHARES 544 SHARES 1.7 K SHARES 411 SHARES
Without depriving you of joy that you truly deserve, have a look at the #DeepVeer wedding pictures that will make your heart into a big ball of mush.
#1
Instagram/Ranveer Singh

Look at these two-spamming all of us with their pictures (and, love). Be happy forever, you two!
title: To Make Up For All That Waiting, Deepika-Ranveer Finally Share Breathtaking Pics From The Wedding

The couple solemnized their six-year-old relationship by tying the knot and exchanging vows in Italy amidst their close friends and family. While the wedding was a private affair, Deepika and Ranveer made sure that all of us feel like we are a part of their celebrations by giving us a glimpse into their world.
